meanings.definition: Having a strong, pleasant taste or smell
meanings.sent1: The soup was so flavory that it made my mouth water.
meanings.sent2: The fresh fruits were so flavory that they were a delight to eat.
meanings.sent3: The flavory aroma of the bakery made everyone in the neighborhood hungry.
meanings.sent4: The spices in the dish danced on my tongue, creating a flavory explosion.
meanings.sent5: The chocolate cake was so flavory that it felt like a party in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: The pizza was incredibly flavory with all the different toppings.
meanings.sent2: The homemade cookies were so flavory that they disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent3: The flavory ice cream melted quickly under the hot sun.
meanings.sent4: The wine was so flavory that it seemed to tell a story with each sip.
meanings.sent5: The curry was so flavory that it left a lasting impression on my taste buds.
